Watch all the NEW full episodes of Numberblocks Season 7, streaming 24/7! Join your favorite Numberblocks as they:

Learn new times tables üßÆ

From mastering multiplication with the Times Tables to thrilling escapades with the Super Eights and Magical Nines, there's always more to explore with numbers! Perfect for preschoolers and young learners to discover math, counting, and multiplication in a fun and engaging way.

üåü Episode Highlights:
Grid Unlocked: Blast off with Fifteen and the Times Tables to solve jet-powered problems! üöÄ
Friendly Fours‚Äô Beach Day: Help Four sort the Friendly Fours in a seaside adventure. üèñÔ∏è
All-Star Line-Up: Rock out with the Family of Five in an all-star performance. ‚≠ê

Numberblocks COMPILATIONS Playlist: https://youtube.com/playlist?list=PL9swKX1PviEqjP8g3GOY6xRNyyMmABJYs

Welcome to Numberland!

BAFTA award-winning Numberblocks helps children to see how numbers really work ‚àí and master a new key maths skill with every adventure. It‚Äôs a story of friends who can always count on each other ‚àí but, most of all, Numberblocks is about having fun with numbers.

Each episode has been carefully crafted with the help of the NCETM (National Centre for Excellence in the Teaching of Mathematics) and brought to life by Blue Zoo Animation Studio.
We work closely with the NCETM to make sure Numberblocks delivers the essential numeracy skills that build good number sense and a solid foundation for a lifetime of maths success.
‚Äç
Get ready for an animated adventure and some number magic that you can count on to help your child learn maths in the most exciting way.
1, 2, 3 ‚àí Let‚Äôs go!

Numberblocks has been nominated for the prestigious BAFTA, Prix Jeunesse and The Japan Prize Audiovisual Pre-school awards, and received a BAFTA for Children's Preschool Animation in 2019. Numberblocks is also featured among the DfE's recommended resources for home learning and is part of BBC Bitesize Daily.

Where to watch Numberblocks

Numberblocks is designed so your child can just press play and have fun while learning essential number skills. 90 episodes take them from number names and counting to a deep understanding of how addition, subtraction, multiplication and division work, via a host of key concepts in between. You can find your favourite characters and episodes on TV, BBC iPlayer, DVD or the Numberblocks YouTube channels

---

What happens when numbers come to life?

Dive into a world of number fun with the hit CBeebies show, Numberblocks. Award-winning characters + big adventures + singalong songs = the best way to get children excited about everything numbers can do!

It's easy when you see it!

Maths is SO much easier when you can see how it works. 90 episodes bring hundreds of essential number skills to life with big visuals and amazing animation, from your first encounter with One to mini-musicals, classic comedy, song-and-dance numbers and a nail-biting escape from the double dungeon of doom!

A comprehensive learning journey

The learning goals behind Numberblocks support maths curricula from around the world, taking young learners step by step through the key topics and skills they need to master for a confident start and a lifelong love of numbers.

Play and learn

Brilliant Numberblocks apps help children take the learning into their own hands.

Get hands-on

Take the learning further with the Numberblocks Maths Programme ‚àí three bumper magazines packed with stickers, colouring and step-by-step hands-on learning activities, plus a special set of Numberblocks blocks.

Let's stay in touch!

We love to hear from you ‚àí your ideas, questions and your little ones‚Äô fantastic creations. Keep up to date with the latest Numberblocks news by following us @Numberblocks on Facebook, Instagram and Twitter and signing up to the Numberblocks Newsletter. Every Monday we share some of your home and school creations, artwork and bakes on Facebook and Instagram so please send us your photos!

short_videos.video_title: Making Christmas Magical! Karaoke Singalong! | Learn to Count | Numberblocks
short_videos.video_description:
Get ready for a festive music video adventure with Numberblocks, Alphablocks, Colourblocks, and Wonderblocks ‚Äî teaming up with FIFTY FIFTY to make Christmas magical! ‚ú®
In this special holiday sing-along, we count down the days, spell out festive words, and fill the world with red, green, and sparkling Christmas colours ‚Äî all with easy-to-follow moves kids can copy at home.

short_videos.video_title: The Driving Dance | Learn to Count | Numberblocks
short_videos.video_description:
Get ready to dance and count with the Numberblocks! In this super fun "The Driving Dance" song, your little ones will learn all about numbers one to five in the most exciting way.

This catchy tune is perfect for toddlers and preschoolers who are starting to learn their numbers. As they sing and dance along with their favourite Numberblocks characters, they'll be learning about counting, shapes, and colours without even realising it!

What's in the video?
Learn to Count: The song focuses on counting from 1 to 5, with each Numberblock and their special car representing a number.
Shapes and Colours: Discover different shapes and colours as each Numberblock drives their uniquely designed vehicle. One's car is red and round, Two's is orange, Three's is a yellow triangle, and Four's is a green square.

Catchy Music and Dance: The upbeat "Driving Dance" song and fun dance moves will have kids jumping and learning.
Engaging Animation: The bright and colourful world of Numberland comes to life, keeping children entertained while they learn.

Sing along with the lyrics:
"One steering wheel, turn it left and right!
One, two lights flashing, oh so bright!
One, two, three beeps in the air,
and four spinning wheels to get us there!"

This educational video is a fantastic way to introduce early math concepts in a playful and memorable way. It's perfect for at-home learning or just for some fun screen time that's also beneficial for your child's development.

0:52 The Driving Dance song begins!

Get ready to count, dance, sing, and celebrate with your favorite Numberblocks! In this fun and safe livestream, kids can learn to count 1, 2, 3, 100 and beyond, spot number patterns, and enjoy colorful number adventures ‚Äî all while moving to happy dance party tracks! üé∂üî¢

Watch all the NEW full episodes of Numberblocks Season 7, streaming 24/7! Join your favorite Numberblocks as they:

Meet new characters ü§©
Learn new times tables üßÆ
Sing catchy new songs üé∂

From mastering multiplication with the Times Tables to thrilling escapades with the Super Eights and Magical Nines, there's always more to explore with numbers! Perfect for preschoolers and young learners to discover math, counting, and multiplication in a fun and engaging way.

üåü Episode Highlights:
Grid Unlocked: Blast off with Fifteen and the Times Tables to solve jet-powered problems! üöÄ
Friendly Fours‚Äô Beach Day: Help Four sort the Friendly Fours in a seaside adventure. üèñÔ∏è
All-Star Line-Up: Rock out with the Family of Five in an all-star performance. ‚≠ê
Super Eights Assemble: Join the ultimate superhero team and save the day! ü¶∏
The Magical Nines: Witness Ninety's amazing magic show and learn the nine times table. ü™Ñ
Space Division: Embark on a space mission with One Hundred and the Times Tables! üõ∞Ô∏è

Numberblocks COMPILATIONS Playlist: https://youtube.com/playlist?list=PL9swKX1PviEqjP8g3GOY6xRNyyMmABJYs

Welcome to Numberland!

BAFTA award-winning Numberblocks helps children to see how numbers really work ‚àí and master a new key maths skill with every adventure. It‚Äôs a story of friends who can always count on each other ‚àí but, most of all, Numberblocks is about having fun with numbers.

Each episode has been carefully crafted with the help of the NCETM (National Centre for Excellence in the Teaching of Mathematics) and brought to life by Blue Zoo Animation Studio.
We work closely with the NCETM to make sure Numberblocks delivers the essential numeracy skills that build good number sense and a solid foundation for a lifetime of maths success.
‚Äç
Get ready for an animated adventure and some number magic that you can count on to help your child learn maths in the most exciting way.
1, 2, 3 ‚àí Let‚Äôs go!

Numberblocks has been nominated for the prestigious BAFTA, Prix Jeunesse and The Japan Prize Audiovisual Pre-school awards, and received a BAFTA for Children's Preschool Animation in 2019. Numberblocks is also featured among the DfE's recommended resources for home learning and is part of BBC Bitesize Daily.

Where to watch Numberblocks

Numberblocks is designed so your child can just press play and have fun while learning essential number skills. 90 episodes take them from number names and counting to a deep understanding of how addition, subtraction, multiplication and division work, via a host of key concepts in between. You can find your favourite characters and episodes on TV, BBC iPlayer, DVD or the Numberblocks YouTube channels

---

What happens when numbers come to life?

Dive into a world of number fun with the hit CBeebies show, Numberblocks. Award-winning characters + big adventures + singalong songs = the best way to get children excited about everything numbers can do!

It's easy when you see it!

Maths is SO much easier when you can see how it works. 90 episodes bring hundreds of essential number skills to life with big visuals and amazing animation, from your first encounter with One to mini-musicals, classic comedy, song-and-dance numbers and a nail-biting escape from the double dungeon of doom!

A comprehensive learning journey

The learning goals behind Numberblocks support maths curricula from around the world, taking young learners step by step through the key topics and skills they need to master for a confident start and a lifelong love of numbers.

Play and learn

Brilliant Numberblocks apps help children take the learning into their own hands.

Get hands-on

Take the learning further with the Numberblocks Maths Programme ‚àí three bumper magazines packed with stickers, colouring and step-by-step hands-on learning activities, plus a special set of Numberblocks blocks.

Let's stay in touch!

We love to hear from you ‚àí your ideas, questions and your little ones‚Äô fantastic creations. Keep up to date with the latest Numberblocks news by following us @Numberblocks on Facebook, Instagram and Twitter and signing up to the Numberblocks Newsletter. Every Monday we share some of your home and school creations, artwork and bakes on Facebook and Instagram so please send us your photos!
